text: I am fascinated with the ladies who minister throughout the Sunday services in sign language. Kudos to them for their hard work!

"Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.‚Äù This is the place without boundary. All those who seek Him shall find peace, joy and rest in their heart

Today was my very first visit here by invitation of my brother and sister in law.  What a blessing to me to see the different nations represented through the mission efforts of the church.  Everyone was so welcoming and warm.  My son and I are truly blessed.  Thank you for having us.  May He bless you abundantly.  AMEN

Very conveniently located above Bartley MRT Station. Friendly church to all nationalities. There is a meeting point in the building on the 1st Floor corner. Outside on 1st level also have some sitting areas. They are having upgrading for their church. Usually Sunday 2 services @ 08:30 & 11:00, but certain occasion 1 combine service @ 10:00

Please tell the sign language worship leader i am very blessed by her worship and signing of the songs and message. God's grace and glory is seen in her ministry. The church should really think of filming her worship to bless others like put on youtube or something. So blessed. May god continue to use her greatly and keep her humble....
